resources.string: This app can undelete/recover deleted contacts from your device. It allows you to view deleted contacts and restore them. Only contacts which are saved in your Google account can be restored, this app will not be able to recover those contacts deleted from SIM card or your device. It also comes with a dialer which is shown when you click on a contact image. The dialer allows you to call/message any of your existing contacts.
Use the Deleted contacts icon in Navigation Menu to view deleted contacts
